code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./GenresPage.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const genreImages={"action":"/image/action.jpg","adventure":"/image/adventure.jpg","animation":"/image/animation.jpg","comedy":"/image/comedy.jpg","crime":"/image/crime.jpeg","documentary":"/image/documentary.jpg","drama":"/image/drama.jpg","family":"/image/family.jpeg","fantasy":"/image/fantasy.jpg","history":"/image/history.jpg","horror":"/image/horror.jpg","music":"/image/music.jpg","mystery":"/image/mystery.jpg","romance":"/image/romance.jpg","skifi":"/image/skifi.jpg","stand-up":"/image/stand-up.jpg","thriller":"/image/thriller.jpg","tv-movie":"/image/tv-movie.jpg","war":"/image/war.jpg","western":"/image/western.jpg"};const GenresPage=()=>{const genres=Object.keys(genreImages);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"genres-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"genres-page__title",children:"\u0416\u0430\u043D\u0440\u044B \u0444\u0438\u043B\u044C\u043C\u043E\u0432"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"genres-page__list",children:genres.map((genre,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/genre/".concat(genre),className:"genres-page__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:genreImages[genre],alt:genre,className:"genres-page__item__image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"genres-page__item__name",children:genre})]},index))})]})});};export default GenresPage;
